resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105396</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105396</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206310</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Quake: 1906 San Francisco Quake</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beben: San Francisco Beben 1906</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tremblement : Tremblement 1906 De San 
Francisco</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quake: Quake 1906 Do San Francisco</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tremito: Tremito 1906 De San Francisco</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σεισμός: 1906 σεισμός του Σαν Φρανσίσκο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Temblor: Temblor 1906 De San Francisco</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">tells why the April 18, 1906, earthquake along the San Andreas Fault was one of the most significant earthquakes of all time. See photos, eyewitness accounts, the 1906 seismogram, and casualty and damage statistics. Learn about the flurry of scientific investigation unleashed by the quake and the advances that followed.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erklärt, warum der April 18, 1906, Erdbeben 
entlang der San Andreas Störung eins der bedeutendsten Erdbeben aller
Zeit war. Sehen Sie Fotos, Augenzeugekonten, das Seismogramm 
1906 und die Unfall- und Beschädigungsstatistiken. Erlernen Sie
über die Aufregung der wissenschaftlichen Untersuchung unleashed 
durch das Beben und die Fortschritte, die folgten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">dit pourquoi 18 avril 1906, tremblement de terre 
le long du défaut de San Andreas était l'un des tremblements de 
terre les plus significatifs de toute l'heure. Voir des photos, 
des comptes de témoin oculaire, le séismogramme 1906, et les 
statistiques d'accident et de dommages. Renseignez-vous sur la 
bourrasque de la recherche scientifique lâchée par le tremblement et
les avances qui ont suivi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">diz porque abril o 18, 1906, terremoto ao longo da
falha do San Andreas era um dos terremotos os mais significativos de 
toda a hora. Veja fotos, clientes da testemunha ocular, o 
seismogram 1906, e statistics da víctima e dos danos. Aprenda 
sobre o flurry da investigação científica desencadeado pelo quake e
pelos avanços que seguiram.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">dice a perchè 18 aprile 1906, terremoto lungo il 
difetto di San Andreas era uno dei terremoti più significativi di 
tutto il tempo. Si vedano le foto, i clienti del testimone 
oculare, il seismogram 1906 e le statistiche di danni e 
dell'incidente. Impari circa il turbine di neve di ricerca 
scientifica liberato tramite il tremito e gli avanzamenti che sono 
seguito.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λέει γιατί 18 Απριλίου ..1906, σεισμός κατά 
μήκος του SAN Ανδρέας Fault ήταν ένας από τους 
σημαντικότερους σεισμούς όλου του χρόνου. Δείτε 
τις φωτογραφίες, τους απολογισμούς αυτοπτών μαρτύρων, 
seismogram του 1906, και τις στατιστικές θυμάτων και ζημίας. 
Μάθετε για την αναταραχή της επιστημονικής έρευνας που 
εξαπολύεται από το σεισμό και τις προόδους που ακολούθησαν.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">dice porqué 18 de abril de 1906, terremoto a 
lo largo del incidente del San Andreas era uno de los terremotos más 
significativos de toda la hora. Vea las fotos, las cuentas del 
testigo presencial, el sismograma 1906, y la estadística de la muerte
y del daños. Aprenda sobre la ráfaga de la investigación 
científica destraillada por el temblor y los avances que siguieron.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206310</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105396</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/quake-1906-san-francisco-quake</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
